column4: I want to use Ubuntu as a medial center and have the files shared so it can also be a server to other window PC's in the house. Cannot get any on the PC's to see Ubuntu box and vice versa
I can be patient...Can someone please confirm you saw my question...is it in que to be answered?
that isn't how it works.  If someone knows the answer, someone will answer you.  If no one answers, try again in 15 minutes
